00096 /*
00097 inline double normalDistribution(double ecks, double mu, double sigma)
00098 {
00099   double tau = 1.0/(sigma*sigma);
00100   double sqrt_tau = 1.0/sigma;
00101   double diff1 = ecks - mu;
00102   double diff2 = tau*diff1*diff1;
00103   return exp(-0.5*diff2);
00104 }
00105 */

00128     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts;
00129 
00130     // SelfDoc::Opt(name, type, value, default, min, max, description)
00131

00133     opts.push_back(lohCNSegSeparation);
00134 
00135     SelfDoc::Opt minInformation = {"minInformation", SelfDoc::Opt::Float, "100", "100", "NA", "NA", "A control of window size." };
00136     opts.push_back(minInformation);
00137

00139     opts.push_back(lambdaCritical);
00140

00144 /**
00145  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00146  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00147  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00148  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00149  *
00150  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00151  *
00152  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00153  */
00154 SelfCreate* CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string>& params)
00155 {
00156     SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00157     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = getDefaultDocOptions();
00158     CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2* pMethod = new CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2();
00159     std::string strPrefix = getPrefix();
00160 
00161     pMethod->m_iLohCNSegSeparation = setupIntParameter("lohCNSegSeparation", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00162 
00163     pMethod->m_fMinInformationCommandLineValue = setupFloatParameter("minInformation", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00164     pMethod->m_fLambdaCriticalCommandLineValue = setupFloatParameter("lambdaCritical", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00165 
00166     return pMethod;
00167 }

00169 void CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::reset()
00170 {
00171     //  There are numerical comparison on these values so they must be reset after each sample is analyzed.
00172     m_fMinInformation=m_fMinInformationCommandLineValue;
00173     m_fLambdaCritical=m_fLambdaCriticalCommandLineValue;
00174 }

00177 /**
00178  * @brief run the analysis
00179  */
00180 void CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::run()
00181 {
00182     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::run(...) start");
00183     isSetup();
00184     reset();
00185 
00186     if(!m_bSNPAlreadyLoaded)
00187     {
00188         ///@todo  Add error messaging if no snp-reference file is input. Also exit run gracefully.
00189         AffxString strFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("snp-reference-input-file");
00190         loadSnpReferenceFile(strFileName);
00191         m_bSNPAlreadyLoaded=true;
00192 
00193 /* The following are the values presently read from the snp-reference file. They are here as a quick reference.
00194 
00195 Full array values
00196 
00197         m_vVarianceInflationValues.push_back(1.423082);
00198         m_vVarianceInflationValues.push_back(1.348103);
00199         m_vVarianceInflationValues.push_back(1.273123);
00200         m_vVarianceInflationValues.push_back(1.198369);
00201         m_vVarianceInflationValues.push_back(1.148516);
00202         m_vVarianceInflationValues.push_back(1.098662);
00203         m_vVarianceInflationValues.push_back(1.0);
00204 
00205         m_vInformationRanges.push_back(0.4061303);
00206         m_vInformationRanges.push_back(0.4733475);
00207         m_vInformationRanges.push_back(0.5923077);
00208         m_vInformationRanges.push_back(0.7761194);
00209         m_vInformationRanges.push_back(0.9158621);
00210         m_vInformationRanges.push_back(1.1380471);
00211 
00212 Focused array values
00213         m_vVarianceInflationValues.push_back(1.4);
00214         m_vVarianceInflationValues.push_back(1.2);
00215         m_vVarianceInflationValues.push_back(1.1);
00216         m_vVarianceInflationValues.push_back(1.0);
00217 
00218 
00219         m_vInformationRanges.push_back(2.8);
00220         m_vInformationRanges.push_back(3.0);
00221         m_vInformationRanges.push_back(3.2);
00222 */
00223 
00224 
00225         m_iNumberOfVIValues=m_vVarianceInflationValues.size();
00226     }
00227 
00228 
00229     std::vector<float> vSCAR(getProbeSets()->size());
00230     std::vector<float> vInformation(getProbeSets()->size());
00231     std::vector<int> vPosition(getProbeSets()->size());
00232     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<double> dHomValueArray;
00233     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<double> dHetValueArray;
00234     dHomValueArray.initialize(getProbeSets()->size(), m_iNumberOfVIValues);
00235     dHetValueArray.initialize(getProbeSets()->size(), m_iNumberOfVIValues);
00236 
00237     // Note that the vPosition is not used anywhere within the LOH calculation. It is placed here to allow comparison against external R
00238     // algorithms which generate beginning and ending positions of windows over the genome.  This windowing is done here in the function lohFind.
00239     // For comparison to these external algorithms, position information is passed to the function lohFind.
00240 
00241     if (!lohPreProcessing(vSCAR, vInformation, vPosition, dHetValueArray, dHomValueArray )) {throw(Except("LohPreProcessing failed."));}
00242 
00243     // storage for intermediate data collected for validation
00244     int iUseProbeSetCount = 0;
00245     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)getProbeSets()->size()); iIndex++) {
00246         if ( getProbeSets()->at(iIndex)->isUseForCyto2LOH() ) {
00247             iUseProbeSetCount++;
00248         }
00249     }
00250     std::vector<int> vWindowStart;
00251     std::vector<int> vWindowLength;
00252     std::vector<double> vWindowTest;
00253     std::vector<double> vWindowInflate;
00254     std::vector<char> vWindowLoh;
00255     vWindowStart.reserve(iUseProbeSetCount);
00256     vWindowLength.reserve(iUseProbeSetCount);
00257     vWindowTest.reserve(iUseProbeSetCount);
00258     vWindowInflate.reserve(iUseProbeSetCount);
00259     vWindowLoh.reserve(iUseProbeSetCount);
00260     std::vector<int> vGenomeChunkStart;
00261     std::vector<int> vGenomeChunkLength;
00262 
00263     int iLastChromosome = getProbeSets()->at(getProbeSets()->size() - 1)->getChromosome();
00264     Verbose::progressBegin(1, "CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::run(...) ", iLastChromosome, 1, iLastChromosome);
00265     for (int iChromosome = 1; (iChromosome <= iLastChromosome); iChromosome++)
00266     {
00267         try
00268         {
00269             if (iChromosome > m_iYChromosome) {continue;}
00270             int iChromosomeProbeSetCount = 0;
00271             for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)getProbeSets()->size()); iIndex++)
00272             {
00273                 CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->at(iIndex);
00274                 if (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() == iChromosome && pobjProbeSet->isUseForCyto2LOH() )
00275                 {
00276                     iChromosomeProbeSetCount++;
00277                 }
00278             }
00279 
00280             if (iChromosomeProbeSetCount == 0) {continue;}
00281             Verbose::progressStep(1);
00282 
00283             std::vector<float> vChromosomeInformation(iChromosomeProbeSetCount);
00284             std::vector<float> vChromosomeSCAR(iChromosomeProbeSetCount);
00285             std::vector<int> vChromosomeProbeSetIndexes(iChromosomeProbeSetCount);
00286             std::vector<int> vChromosomePosition(iChromosomeProbeSetCount);
00287             AffxMultiDimensionalArray<double> dChromosomeHomValueArray;
00288             AffxMultiDimensionalArray<double> dChromosomeHetValueArray;
00289             dChromosomeHomValueArray.initialize(iChromosomeProbeSetCount, m_iNumberOfVIValues);
00290             dChromosomeHetValueArray.initialize(iChromosomeProbeSetCount, m_iNumberOfVIValues);
00291 
00292             int iProbeSetIndex = 0;
00293             for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)getProbeSets()->size()); iIndex++)
00294             {
00295                 CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->at(iIndex);
00296 
00297                 if ( pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() == iChromosome && pobjProbeSet->isUseForCyto2LOH() )
00298                 {
00299                     //  This is the location that we see the necessity of having vSCARreduced and vSCAR.  We
00300                     //  cannot, at this point in the code have vSCAR containing only SCAR values for probes
00301                     //  with valid SCARs and HomHet values since we need to access them via the index of the
00302                     //  "getProbeSets" vector.
00303                     vChromosomeSCAR[iProbeSetIndex] = vSCAR[iIndex];
00304                     vChromosomeInformation[iProbeSetIndex] = vInformation[iIndex];
00305                     vChromosomeProbeSetIndexes[iProbeSetIndex] = iIndex;
00306                     vChromosomePosition[iProbeSetIndex] = vPosition[iIndex];
00307 
00308                     for(int iValueIndex=0; iValueIndex<m_iNumberOfVIValues; iValueIndex++)
00309                     {
00310                             dChromosomeHomValueArray.set(iProbeSetIndex, iValueIndex, dHomValueArray.get(iIndex, iValueIndex));
00311                             dChromosomeHetValueArray.set(iProbeSetIndex, iValueIndex, dHetValueArray.get(iIndex, iValueIndex));
00312                     }
00313                     iProbeSetIndex++;
00314                 }
00315             }
00316             int iStartIndex = 0;
00317             for (int iIndex = 1; (iIndex <= iChromosomeProbeSetCount); iIndex++)
00318             {
00319                 //  Note that iIndex may equal iChromosomeProbeSetCount but this will not cause a problem in the access
00320                 //  to the vector vChromosomeProbeSetIndex in the next line since the first part of the  || will fail first.
00321                 if ((iIndex == iChromosomeProbeSetCount) || ((getProbeSets()->at(vChromosomeProbeSetIndexes[iIndex])->getPosition() - getProbeSets()->at(vChromosomeProbeSetIndexes[iIndex - 1])->getPosition()) > m_iLohCNSegSeparation))
00322                 {
00323                     int iSegmentProbeSetCount = ((iIndex - 1) - iStartIndex + 1);
00324                     std::vector<float> vSegmentSCAR(iSegmentProbeSetCount);
00325                     std::vector<float> vSegmentInformation(iSegmentProbeSetCount);
00326                     std::vector<char> vLoh(iSegmentProbeSetCount, 0);
00327                     std::vector<int> vSegmentPosition(iSegmentProbeSetCount);
00328                     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<double> dSegmentHomValueArray;
00329                     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<double> dSegmentHetValueArray;
00330                     dSegmentHomValueArray.initialize(iSegmentProbeSetCount, m_iNumberOfVIValues);
00331                     dSegmentHetValueArray.initialize(iSegmentProbeSetCount, m_iNumberOfVIValues);
00332 
00333                     for (int iSegmentIndex = 0; (iSegmentIndex < iSegmentProbeSetCount); iSegmentIndex++)
00334                     {
00335 
00336                         vSegmentPosition[iSegmentIndex] = vChromosomePosition[iStartIndex + iSegmentIndex];
00337                         vSegmentSCAR[iSegmentIndex] = vChromosomeSCAR[iStartIndex + iSegmentIndex];
00338                         vSegmentInformation[iSegmentIndex] = vChromosomeInformation[iStartIndex + iSegmentIndex];
00339                         for(int iValueIndex=0; iValueIndex<m_iNumberOfVIValues; iValueIndex++)
00340                         {
00341                             dSegmentHomValueArray.set(iSegmentIndex, iValueIndex, dChromosomeHomValueArray.get(iStartIndex+iSegmentIndex, iValueIndex));
00342                             dSegmentHetValueArray.set(iSegmentIndex, iValueIndex, dChromosomeHetValueArray.get(iStartIndex+iSegmentIndex, iValueIndex));
00343                         }
00344                     }
00345                     std::vector<int> vSegmentWindowStart(iSegmentProbeSetCount, -1);
00346                     std::vector<int> vSegmentWindowLength(iSegmentProbeSetCount, -1);
00347                     std::vector<double> vSegmentWindowTest(iSegmentProbeSetCount, numeric_limits<float>::quiet_NaN() );
00348                     std::vector<double> vSegmentWindowInflate(iSegmentProbeSetCount, numeric_limits<float>::quiet_NaN() );
00349                     std::vector<char> vSegmentWindowLoh(iSegmentProbeSetCount, 0);
00350                     lohFind(vSegmentSCAR, vSegmentInformation, vSegmentPosition, vLoh, dSegmentHomValueArray, dSegmentHetValueArray, vSegmentWindowStart, vSegmentWindowLength, vSegmentWindowTest, vSegmentWindowInflate, vSegmentWindowLoh);
00351                     for (int iSegmentIndex = 0; (iSegmentIndex < iSegmentProbeSetCount); iSegmentIndex++)
00352                     {
00353                         getProbeSets()->at(vChromosomeProbeSetIndexes[iStartIndex + iSegmentIndex])->setLoh(vLoh[iSegmentIndex]);
00354                         if( vSegmentWindowStart[iSegmentIndex] >= 0 ) {
00355                             vWindowStart.push_back( vChromosomeProbeSetIndexes[ iStartIndex + vSegmentWindowStart[iSegmentIndex] ] );
00356                             vWindowLength.push_back( vSegmentWindowLength[iSegmentIndex] );
00357                             vWindowTest.push_back( vSegmentWindowTest[iSegmentIndex] );
00358                             vWindowInflate.push_back( vSegmentWindowInflate[iSegmentIndex] );
00359                             vWindowLoh.push_back( vSegmentWindowLoh[iSegmentIndex] );
00360                         }
00361                     }
00362                     vGenomeChunkStart.push_back( vChromosomeProbeSetIndexes[iStartIndex] );
00363                     vGenomeChunkLength.push_back( iSegmentProbeSetCount );
00364                     iStartIndex = iIndex;
00365                 }
00366             }
00367         }
00368         catch(...) {
00369             Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::run(...) Working on Chromosome " + ::getInt(iChromosome));
00370             throw;
00371         }
00372     }
00373 
00374     m_vSegments.deleteAll();
00375     std::vector<double> vHomValues;
00376     std::vector<double> vHetValues;
00377 
00378     for(int iIndex=0; iIndex < getProbeSets()->size();iIndex++)
00379     {
00380         vHomValues.push_back(dHomValueArray.get(iIndex,m_iNumberOfVIValues-1));
00381         vHetValues.push_back(dHetValueArray.get(iIndex,m_iNumberOfVIValues-1));
00382     }
00383 
00384     newSegments(getSegmentType(), vSCAR, vHomValues, vHetValues);
00385     calculateSummaryLOH();
00386     newSegments(4, vSCAR, vHomValues, vHetValues);
00387     newSegments(5, vSCAR, vHomValues, vHetValues);
00388 
00389     if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("keep-intermediate-data"))
00390     {
00391         writeLOH( vSCAR, vGenomeChunkStart, vGenomeChunkLength, vWindowStart, vWindowLength, vWindowTest, vWindowInflate, vWindowLoh );
00392     }
00393 
00394     Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done");
00395     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::run(...) end");
00396 }

00398 
00399 void CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::computeGlobalSnpParameters()
00400 {
00401 
00402     // At this point a value for m_fEMSN has been computed and the value of m_fLambdaCritical gotten from command line.
00403     // If these values fall out of the ranges of the lookup table we set them to the boundary values of the table.
00404     int iEMSNIndex = 0;
00405     int iLambdaIndex = 0;
00406 
00407     float fMaxEMSNValue = m_fEMSNStartingValue + ((m_iNumberOfEMSNPoints-1) * m_fEMSNSpacing);
00408     if(m_fEMSN > fMaxEMSNValue)
00409     {
00410         iEMSNIndex = m_iNumberOfEMSNPoints-1;
00411     } else
00412     {
00413         if(m_fEMSN < m_fEMSNStartingValue)
00414         {
00415             iEMSNIndex=0;
00416         } else
00417         {
00418             float fEMSNFloatIndex = (m_fEMSN - m_fEMSNStartingValue) / m_fEMSNSpacing;
00419             double dEMSNTruncated=0.0;
00420             double dEMSNRemainder = modf((double)fEMSNFloatIndex, &dEMSNTruncated);
00421             if(dEMSNRemainder > 0.5) dEMSNTruncated = dEMSNTruncated + 1.0;
00422             iEMSNIndex = (int) dEMSNTruncated;
00423         }
00424     }
00425 
00426     float fMaxLambdaValue = m_fLambdaStartingValue + ((m_iNumberOfLambdaPoints-1) * m_fLambdaSpacing);
00427     if(m_fLambdaCritical > fMaxLambdaValue)
00428     {
00429         iLambdaIndex = m_iNumberOfLambdaPoints-1;
00430     } else
00431     {
00432         if(m_fLambdaCritical < m_fLambdaStartingValue)
00433         {
00434             iLambdaIndex=0;
00435         } else
00436         {
00437             float fLambdaFloatIndex = (m_fLambdaCritical - m_fLambdaStartingValue) / m_fLambdaSpacing;
00438             double dLambdaTruncated=0.0;
00439             double dLambdaRemainder = modf((double)fLambdaFloatIndex, &dLambdaTruncated);
00440             if(dLambdaRemainder > 0.5) dLambdaTruncated = dLambdaTruncated + 1.0;
00441             iLambdaIndex = (int) dLambdaTruncated;
00442         }
00443     }
00444 
00445     float fTmin = m_dEMSNArray.get(iEMSNIndex, iLambdaIndex);
00446     if(m_fMinInformation < fTmin) m_fMinInformation = fTmin;
00447     Verbose::out(3, "CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::minInformation value is: " + AffxString::doubleToString((double)m_fMinInformation, 6, false));
00448 }

00451 
00452 bool CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::loadSnpReferenceFile(const AffxString& strFileName)
00453 {
00454     Verbose::out(3, "CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::loadSnpReferenceFile");
00455     bool bSuccessful = false;
00456     if (affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(strFileName))
00457     {
00458         try
00459         {
00460             affx::File5_File file5;
00461             file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00462             affx::File5_Group* group5 = file5.openGroup("SNPReference", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00463             affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5;
00464 
00465             tsv5 = group5->openTsv("EMSNParameters", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00466             double dInputDouble=0.0;
00467             int iInputInteger=0;
00468             while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00469             {
00470                 tsv5->get(0, 0, &dInputDouble);  m_fLambdaSpacing=(float)dInputDouble;
00471                 tsv5->get(0, 1, &dInputDouble);  m_fEMSNSpacing=(float)dInputDouble;
00472                 tsv5->get(0, 2, &dInputDouble);  m_fLambdaStartingValue=(float)dInputDouble;
00473                 tsv5->get(0, 3, &dInputDouble);  m_fEMSNStartingValue=(float)dInputDouble;
00474                 tsv5->get(0, 4, &iInputInteger); m_iNumberOfLambdaPoints=iInputInteger;
00475                 tsv5->get(0, 5, &iInputInteger); m_iNumberOfEMSNPoints=iInputInteger;
00476             }
00477             tsv5->close();
00478             delete tsv5;
00479 
00480 
00481             m_dEMSNArray.initialize(m_iNumberOfEMSNPoints, m_iNumberOfLambdaPoints);
00482             tsv5 = group5->openTsv("EMSNArray", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00483             dInputDouble=0.0;
00484             int iRowCount=0;
00485             while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00486             {
00487                 for(int iIndex=0; iIndex < m_iNumberOfLambdaPoints; iIndex++)
00488                 {
00489                     tsv5->get(0, iIndex, &dInputDouble);
00490                     m_dEMSNArray.set(iRowCount, iIndex, dInputDouble);
00491                 }
00492                 iRowCount++;
00493             }
00494             tsv5->close();
00495             delete tsv5;
00496 
00497 
00498             if(group5->name_exists("VIRanges") && group5->name_exists("VIValues"))
00499             {
00500                 tsv5 = group5->openTsv("VIRanges", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00501                 if(tsv5)
00502                 {
00503                     dInputDouble=0.0;
00504                     while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00505                     {
00506                         tsv5->get(0, 0, &dInputDouble);
00507                         m_vInformationRanges.push_back(dInputDouble);
00508                     }
00509                 }
00510                 tsv5->close();
00511                 delete tsv5;
00512 
00513                 tsv5 = group5->openTsv("VIValues", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00514                 if(tsv5)
00515                 {
00516                     dInputDouble=0.0;
00517                     while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00518                     {
00519                         tsv5->get(0, 0, &dInputDouble);
00520                         m_vVarianceInflationValues.push_back(dInputDouble);
00521                     }
00522                     tsv5->close();
00523                     delete tsv5;
00524                 }
00525             }
00526             else
00527             {
00528                 m_vVarianceInflationValues.push_back(1.0);
00529             }
00530 
00531             group5->close();
00532             delete group5;
00533             file5.close();
00534             bSuccessful = true;
00535 
00536         } catch(...) {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
00537     }
00538     return bSuccessful;
00539 }
00540 
00541 float CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::logLikelihood(  std::vector<float>& vfEcks,
00542                                                 float fMu,
00543                                                 float fSigma,
00544                                                 float fDelta,
00545                                                 float fProbability1,
00546                                                 float fProbability2,
00547                                                 float fProbability3)
00548 {
00549     float fLogLikelihood=0.0;
00550     int iNumberOfProbesets= vfEcks.size();
00551     for(int iIndex=0; iIndex<iNumberOfProbesets;iIndex++)
00552     {
00553         float fTermInSum=0.0;
00554         fTermInSum += fProbability1 * normalDistribution( (double)(vfEcks[iIndex]), (double)(fMu+fDelta), (double)fSigma);
00555         fTermInSum += fProbability2 * normalDistribution( (double)(vfEcks[iIndex]), (double)fMu, (double)(0.92 * fSigma));
00556         fTermInSum += fProbability3 * normalDistribution( (double)(vfEcks[iIndex]), (double)(fMu-fDelta), (double)fSigma);
00557         fLogLikelihood+=log(fTermInSum);
00558     }
00559 
00560     return fLogLikelihood;
00561 }
00562 
00563 bool CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::computeGlobalParameters(    const std::vector<float>& vSCAR,
00564                                                         double & fMu,
00565                                                         double & fSigma,
00566                                                         double& fDelta,
00567                                                         double& fProbability1,
00568                                                         double& fProbability2,
00569                                                         double& fProbability3)
00570 {
00571 
00572     // Just a bit of Canada....
00573     std::vector<double> vfZed1;
00574     std::vector<double> vfZed2;
00575     std::vector<double> vfZed3;
00576 
00577     std::vector<float> vSCARreduced;
00578 
00579     int iNumberOfProbeSets = vSCAR.size();
00580     for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < iNumberOfProbeSets; iIndex++)
00581     {
00582 
00583         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex);
00584         if(pobjProbeSet->getValidSCARExists() && pobjProbeSet->getUseInEMAlgorithm() == 1)
00585         {
00586              if(pobjProbeSet->getInformation() == 0)
00587              {
00588                  int i=0;
00589                  i++;
00590              }
00591         }
00592 
00593 
00594         if(pobjProbeSet->getValidSCARExists() && pobjProbeSet->getUseInEMAlgorithm() == 1 && pobjProbeSet->getInformation() !=0)
00595         {
00596             vSCARreduced.push_back(vSCAR[iIndex]);
00597         }
00598     }
00599 
00600     iNumberOfProbeSets=vSCARreduced.size();
00601     for(int iIndex=0; iIndex<iNumberOfProbeSets; iIndex++)
00602     {
00603         vfZed1.push_back( fProbability1 * normalDistribution((double)(vSCARreduced[iIndex]), (double)(fMu+fDelta), (double) fSigma) );
00604         vfZed2.push_back( fProbability2 * normalDistribution((double)(vSCARreduced[iIndex]), (double) fMu, (double)(0.92*fSigma)) );
00605         vfZed3.push_back( fProbability3 * normalDistribution((double)(vSCARreduced[iIndex]), (double)(fMu-fDelta), (double)fSigma) );
00606     }
00607 
00608     bool bPrecisionCheckPassed=false;
00609     double fPrecisionOld=0.0;
00610     bPrecisionCheckPassed=sumLogsInVector(vfZed1, vfZed2, vfZed3,fPrecisionOld);
00611     if(!bPrecisionCheckPassed)
00612     {
00613         //  We expect that the failure of computeGlobalParameters will be dealt with by the calling function. i.e Error messaging.
00614         return false;
00615     }
00616 
00617     double fPrecisionNew = fPrecisionOld+1;;
00618     int iLoopIndex=1;
00619     double fConstant = 0.92 * 0.92;
00620 
00621 
00622 
00623 /*      This is code to output intermediate values computed in the EM algorithm.
00624     affx::TsvFile *tsv = new affx::TsvFile;
00625     tsv->writeTsv(getExperiment()->getExperimentName() + ".EM.txt");
00626     tsv->defineColumn(      0,0,"mu", affx::TSV_TYPE_DOUBLE);
00627     tsv->defineColumn(      0,1,"delta", affx::TSV_TYPE_DOUBLE);
00628     tsv->defineColumn(      0,2,"sigma", affx::TSV_TYPE_DOUBLE);
00629     tsv->defineColumn(      0,3,"pi1", affx::TSV_TYPE_DOUBLE);
00630     tsv->defineColumn(      0,4,"pi2", affx::TSV_TYPE_DOUBLE);
00631     tsv->defineColumn(      0,5,"pi3", affx::TSV_TYPE_DOUBLE);
00632     tsv->defineColumn(      0,6,"precision", affx::TSV_TYPE_DOUBLE);
00633     tsv->defineColumn(      0,7,"loopIndex", affx::TSV_TYPE_INT);
00634 */
00635     while(iLoopIndex < 100 && fPrecisionNew - fPrecisionOld > 0.00005)
00636     {
00637         iLoopIndex++;
00638         fPrecisionOld=fPrecisionNew;
00639         double fASum=0.0;
00640         double fBSum=0.0;
00641         double fC1Sum=0.0;
00642         double fC2Sum=0.0;
00643         double fD1Sum=0.0;
00644 
00645         double fZed1Term=0.0;
00646         double fZed2Term=0.0;
00647         double fZed3Term=0.0;
00648 
00649         double fZed1Sum=0.0;
00650         double fZed2Sum=0.0;
00651         double fZed3Sum=0.0;
00652 
00653         for(int iIndex=0; iIndex<iNumberOfProbeSets; iIndex++)
00654         {
00655             double fSum= vfZed1[iIndex] + vfZed2[iIndex] + vfZed3[iIndex];
00656             fZed1Term = vfZed1[iIndex]/fSum;
00657             fZed2Term = vfZed2[iIndex]/fSum;
00658             fZed3Term = vfZed3[iIndex]/fSum;
00659 
00660             vfZed1[iIndex] = fZed1Term;
00661             vfZed2[iIndex] = fZed2Term;
00662             vfZed3[iIndex] = fZed3Term;
00663 
00664             fZed1Sum+=fZed1Term;
00665             fZed2Sum+=fZed2Term;
00666             fZed3Sum+=fZed3Term;
00667 
00668             fASum += ( fZed1Term - fZed3Term );
00669             fBSum += ( fZed1Term + fZed3Term );
00670             fC2Sum += ( (fZed1Term - fZed3Term ) * (double) vSCARreduced[iIndex]);
00671 
00672             double fTemporaryValue= fConstant*(fZed1Term  +fZed3Term) + fZed2Term;
00673             fD1Sum += fTemporaryValue ;
00674             fC1Sum += (fTemporaryValue * (double) vSCARreduced[iIndex]);
00675         }
00676 
00677         fMu=((fBSum* fC1Sum) + (fConstant*fASum*fC2Sum)) / ( (fBSum*fD1Sum)-(fConstant*fASum*fASum) );
00678         fDelta =  fMu*(fASum/fBSum) + (fC2Sum/fBSum);
00679 
00680         fSigma=0.0;
00681         for(int iIndex=0; iIndex<iNumberOfProbeSets; iIndex++)
00682         {
00683             fSigma+=    (
00684 
00685                             ( vfZed1[iIndex]*( ((double)vSCARreduced[iIndex] - (fMu+fDelta)) * ((double) vSCARreduced[iIndex] -(fMu+fDelta)) )  )
00686                              +
00687                             ( (1.0/fConstant)*vfZed2[iIndex]*( ((double)vSCARreduced[iIndex] -fMu)*((double)vSCARreduced[iIndex] -fMu) )  )
00688                              +
00689                             ( vfZed3[iIndex]*( ((double)vSCARreduced[iIndex] - (fMu-fDelta)) * ((double)vSCARreduced[iIndex] -(fMu-fDelta)) )  )
00690 
00691                             );
00692         }
00693 
00694         fSigma=sqrt(fSigma/iNumberOfProbeSets);
00695 
00696         fProbability1=fZed1Sum/iNumberOfProbeSets;
00697         fProbability2=fZed2Sum/iNumberOfProbeSets;
00698         fProbability3=fZed3Sum/iNumberOfProbeSets;
00699 
00700         for(int iIndex=0; iIndex<iNumberOfProbeSets; iIndex++)
00701         {
00702             vfZed1[iIndex]=fProbability1*normalDistribution((double)(vSCARreduced[iIndex]),double(fMu+fDelta),(double)fSigma);
00703             vfZed2[iIndex]=fProbability2*normalDistribution((double)(vSCARreduced[iIndex]), (double)(fMu),(double)(0.92*fSigma));
00704             vfZed3[iIndex]=fProbability3*normalDistribution((double)(vSCARreduced[iIndex]), (double)(fMu-fDelta),(double)fSigma);
00705         }
00706         fPrecisionNew=0.0;
00707         bPrecisionCheckPassed=sumLogsInVector(vfZed1, vfZed2, vfZed3, fPrecisionNew);
00708         if(!bPrecisionCheckPassed){
00709             //  We expect that the failure of computeGlobalParameters will be dealt with by the calling function. i.e Error messaging.
00710             return false;
00711         }
00712 
00713 /*              This is code to output intermediate values in the EM algorithm.
00714         bool testFlag = false;
00715         if(testFlag)
00716         {
00717             tsv->set(0,0,fMu);
00718             tsv->set(0,1,fDelta);
00719             tsv->set(0,2,fSigma);
00720             tsv->set(0,3,fProbability1);
00721             tsv->set(0,4,fProbability2);
00722             tsv->set(0,5,fProbability3);
00723             tsv->set(0,6,fPrecisionNew);
00724             tsv->set(0,7,iLoopIndex);
00725             tsv->writeLevel(0);
00726         }
00727 */
00728     }
00729 /*      This is code to output intermediate values in the EM algorithm.
00730     delete tsv;
00731 */
00732     if(iLoopIndex==100)
00733         return false;
00734     else
00735         return true;
00736 }
00737 
00738 bool CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::sumLogsInVector(            const std::vector<double>& vfZed1,
00739                                                         const std::vector<double>& vfZed2,
00740                                                         const std::vector<double>& vfZed3,
00741                                                         double& fSumOfLogs)
00742 {
00743     int iNumberOfProbeSets = vfZed1.size();
00744     float fTermInSum=0.0;
00745     for(int iIndex=0; iIndex<iNumberOfProbeSets; iIndex++)
00746     {
00747         fTermInSum=0.0;
00748         fTermInSum+=vfZed1[iIndex];
00749         fTermInSum+=vfZed2[iIndex];
00750         fTermInSum+=vfZed3[iIndex];
00751         if(fTermInSum<=0.0)
00752         {
00753             Verbose::warn(1, "CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::Expectation-Minimization algorithm did not converge.  Invalid terms were computed which checking precision of the computed parameters.  Global snp parameters will be taken from command line or snp-reference-input-file");
00754             return false;
00755         }
00756         fSumOfLogs += log(fTermInSum);
00757     }
00758     return true;
00759 }
00760 
00761 
00762 
00763 /**
00764  * @brief Preprocess the log2Ratio and probeset parameters to procude the SCAR values.
00765  * @return bool - Was the function successful or not (true = successful)
00766  */
00767 bool CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::lohPreProcessing(        std::vector<float>& vSCAR,
00768                                                         std::vector<float>& vInformation,
00769                                                         std::vector<int>& vPosition,
00770                                                         AffxMultiDimensionalArray<double>& dHetValueArray,
00771                                                         AffxMultiDimensionalArray<double>& dHomValueArray )
00772 {
00773     loadInformationVector(vInformation);
00774 
00775     loadPositionVector(vPosition);
00776 
00777     computeSCAR(vSCAR);
00778 
00779     double fMu=0.0;
00780     double fSigma=0.5;
00781     double fDelta=1.0;
00782     double fProbability1=0.34;
00783     double fProbability2=0.32;
00784     double fProbability3=0.34;
00785 
00786     bool bGP=false;
00787     bGP = computeGlobalParameters(  vSCAR,
00788                                     fMu,
00789                                     fSigma,
00790                                     fDelta,
00791                                     fProbability1,
00792                                     fProbability2,
00793                                     fProbability3 );
00794     bGP=true;
00795     if(bGP)
00796     {
00797         m_fMuPrimeAA=fMu+fDelta;
00798         m_fMuPrimeAB=fMu;
00799         m_fMuPrimeBB=fMu-fDelta;
00800 
00801         m_fSigmaPrimeAA=fSigma;
00802         m_fSigmaPrimeAB=0.92*fSigma;
00803         m_fSigmaPrimeBB=fSigma;
00804         m_fEMSN = (fMu + fDelta) / fSigma;
00805         Verbose::out(3, "CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::fMu values is: " + AffxString::doubleToString((double)fMu, 6, false));
00806         Verbose::out(3, "CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::fDelta values is: " + AffxString::doubleToString((double)fDelta, 6, false));
00807         Verbose::out(3, "CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::fSigma values is: " + AffxString::doubleToString((double)fSigma, 6, false));
00808     }
00809 
00810     computeGlobalSnpParameters();
00811 
00812     computeHomHetValues(    vSCAR,
00813                             dHetValueArray,
00814                             dHomValueArray  );
00815 
00816     return true;
00817 }
00818 
00819 void CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::loadInformationVector(std::vector<float> &vInformation)
00820 {
00821     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)getProbeSets()->size()); iIndex++)
00822     {
00823         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->at(iIndex);
00824         vInformation[iIndex] = pobjProbeSet->getInformation();
00825     }
00826 }
00827 
00828 void CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::loadPositionVector(std::vector<int> &vPosition)
00829 {
00830     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)getProbeSets()->size()); iIndex++)
00831     {
00832         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->at(iIndex);
00833         vPosition[iIndex] = pobjProbeSet->getPosition();
00834     }
00835 }
00836 
00837 void CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2:: computeHomHetValues(    const std::vector<float>& vSCAR,
00838                                                         AffxMultiDimensionalArray<double>& dHetValueArray,
00839                                                         AffxMultiDimensionalArray<double>& dHomValueArray)
00840 {
00841     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)getProbeSets()->size()); iIndex++)
00842     {
00843     for(int iValueIndex=0; iValueIndex < m_iNumberOfVIValues; iValueIndex++)
00844     {
00845         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->at(iIndex);
00846         pobjProbeSet->setLoh(numeric_limits<float>::quiet_NaN());
00847 
00848         // We attempt to calculate Hom Het values for ProbeSets with valid SCAR values.
00849         if( ! pobjProbeSet->processAsSNP())
00850         {
00851             //  The default value of using a probeset for hom/het calculations is true.
00852             //  So if it is not a SNP probeset we must set it to false.
00853             pobjProbeSet->setValidHomHetExists(false);
00854             dHomValueArray.set(iIndex, iValueIndex, CN_INVALID_DOUBLE);
00855             dHetValueArray.set(iIndex, iValueIndex, CN_INVALID_DOUBLE);
00856             continue;
00857         }
00858         if(pobjProbeSet->getValidSCARExists())
00859         {
00860             if(pobjProbeSet->getAAlleleSignal() == 0.0 || pobjProbeSet->getBAlleleSignal() == 0.0){
00861                 Verbose::warn(1, "CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2:: Invalid A or B allele signals were found for the ProbeSet " + pobjProbeSet->getProbeSetName());
00862                 dHomValueArray.set(iIndex, iValueIndex, CN_INVALID_DOUBLE);
00863                 dHetValueArray.set(iIndex, iValueIndex, CN_INVALID_DOUBLE);
00864                 //  The default value of using a probeset for hom/het calculations is true.
00865                 //  So if it is no valid SCARs we calculated we must set it to false.
00866                 pobjProbeSet->setValidHomHetExists(false);
00867                 continue;
00868             }
00869             if(pobjProbeSet->getMuAA() == CN_INVALID_DOUBLE || pobjProbeSet->getMuAB() == CN_INVALID_DOUBLE || pobjProbeSet->getMuBB() == CN_INVALID_DOUBLE)
00870             {
00871                 Verbose::warn(1, "CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2:: Invalid snp-reference parameters for probe set " + pobjProbeSet->getProbeSetName() + ". LOH computations will be done without this probe set.");
00872                 dHomValueArray.set(iIndex, iValueIndex, CN_INVALID_DOUBLE);
00873                 dHetValueArray.set(iIndex, iValueIndex, CN_INVALID_DOUBLE);
00874                 //  The default value of using a probeset for hom/het calculations is true.
00875                 //  So if it is no valid global parameters exist we must set it to false.
00876                 pobjProbeSet->setValidHomHetExists(false);
00877                 continue;
00878             }
00879 
00880            float  fSCAR = vSCAR[iIndex];
00881            double dVarianceInflationFactor = m_vVarianceInflationValues[iValueIndex];
00882            double dHomValueTemp = homDistribution( (double) fSCAR,
00883                                                      0.5,
00884                                                      0.5,
00885                                                      (double) m_fMuPrimeAA,
00886                                                      dVarianceInflationFactor * (double) m_fSigmaPrimeAA,
00887                                                      (double) m_fMuPrimeBB,
00888                                                      dVarianceInflationFactor * (double) m_fSigmaPrimeBB) ;
00889 
00890 
00891             double dHetValueTemp = hetDistribution( (double) fSCAR,
00892                                                     0.375,
00893                                                     0.375,
00894                                                     0.25,
00895                                                     (double) m_fMuPrimeAA,
00896                                                     dVarianceInflationFactor * (double) m_fSigmaPrimeAA,
00897                                                     (double) m_fMuPrimeBB,
00898                                                     dVarianceInflationFactor * (double) m_fSigmaPrimeBB,
00899                                                     (double) m_fMuPrimeAB,
00900                                                     dVarianceInflationFactor * (double) m_fSigmaPrimeAB);
00901 
00902 
00903            //  The default value of using a probeset for hom/het calculations is true.
00904            //  Thus any failure of the hom/het computations for any variance inflation will cause the
00905            //  probeset to be unavailable for all variance inflation computations.
00906            //  MG May have to modify this functionality if it doesn't match Ben's.
00907 
00908            if( dHomValueTemp > 10.0e-25 && dHetValueTemp > 10.0e-25)
00909            {
00910                double dInformation = pobjProbeSet->getInformation();
00911                dHomValueArray.set(iIndex, iValueIndex, dInformation * log(dHomValueTemp));
00912                dHetValueArray.set(iIndex, iValueIndex, dInformation * log(dHetValueTemp));
00913                //MG pobjProbeSet->setValidHomHetExists(true);
00914            } else
00915            {
00916                Verbose::warn(3, "CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2:: Invalid hom and or het values have been calculated for ProbeSet " + pobjProbeSet->getProbeSetName()+ " It will not be used in LOH computations.");
00917                dHomValueArray.set(iIndex, iValueIndex, CN_INVALID_DOUBLE);
00918                dHetValueArray.set(iIndex, iValueIndex, CN_INVALID_DOUBLE);
00919                pobjProbeSet->setValidHomHetExists(false);
00920            }
00921         }
00922         else
00923         {
00924             dHomValueArray.set(iIndex, iValueIndex, CN_INVALID_DOUBLE);
00925             dHetValueArray.set(iIndex, iValueIndex, CN_INVALID_DOUBLE);
00926             pobjProbeSet->setValidHomHetExists(false);
00927         }
00928     }
00929     }
00930 }
00931 
00932 
00933 float CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::sumVector(    int iStart,
00934                                               int iEnd,
00935                                               const std::vector<float>& vInputVector)
00936 {
00937     float partialSum=0.0;
00938     for(int i=iStart; i<=iEnd; i++)
00939     {
00940         partialSum += vInputVector[i];
00941     }
00942     return partialSum;
00943 }
00944 
00945 /**
00946  * @brief Find the runs off LOH
00947  * @param std::vector<char>& - The SCAR values for each probeset
00948  * @param std::vector<int>& - The chromosome positions
00949  * @param std::vector<char>& - The resulting LOH calls (1 = LOH, 0 = !LOH)
00950  */
00951 bool CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::lohFind( const std::vector<float>& vSCAR,
00952                                         const std::vector<float>& vInformation,
00953                                         const std::vector<int>& vPosition,
00954                                         std::vector<char>& vLoh,
00955                                         AffxMultiDimensionalArray<double>& dHomValueArray,
00956                                         AffxMultiDimensionalArray<double>& dHetValueArray,
00957                                         std::vector<int>& vWindowStart,
00958                                         std::vector<int>& vWindowLength,
00959                                         std::vector<double>& vWindowTest,
00960                                         std::vector<double>& vWindowInflate,
00961                                         std::vector<char>& vWindowLoh)
00962 
00963 {
00964     int iEndOfSegment= vSCAR.size();
00965     int iStart=0;
00966     int iEnd=0;
00967     float fLoh=0.0;
00968     float fInformation=0.0;
00969     int iVarianceInflationIndex=0;
00970 
00971 
00972     while(sumVector(iStart, iEnd, vInformation) < m_fMinInformation && iEnd < iEndOfSegment-1) {
00973         iEnd++;
00974     }
00975     // If we don't have don't have enough probesets to generate m_fMinInformation we set LOH = 0;
00976     if(sumVector(iStart, iEnd, vInformation) < m_fMinInformation)
00977     {
00978         for(int i=iStart; i<=iEnd; i++)
00979         {
00980             vLoh[i] = 0;
00981         }
00982         vWindowStart[iStart] = iStart;
00983         vWindowLength[iStart] = iEnd - iStart + 1;
00984         vWindowLoh[iStart] = 0;
00985         return true;
00986     }
00987 
00988     iVarianceInflationIndex = determineVarianceInflationIndex(iStart, iEnd, vInformation);
00989 
00990     fLoh = likelihood(iStart, iEnd, dHomValueArray, dHetValueArray, iVarianceInflationIndex);
00991     if(fLoh > m_fLambdaCritical)
00992     {
00993         for(int i=iStart; i<=iEnd; i++)
00994         {
00995             vLoh[i] = 1;
00996         }
00997     }
00998     vWindowStart[iStart] = iStart;
00999     vWindowLength[iStart] = iEnd - iStart + 1;
01000     vWindowTest[iStart] = fLoh;
01001     vWindowInflate[iStart] = m_vVarianceInflationValues[iVarianceInflationIndex];
01002     if(fLoh > m_fLambdaCritical) {
01003         vWindowLoh[iStart] = 1;
01004     }
01005     else {
01006         vWindowLoh[iStart] = 0;
01007     }
01008 
01009     while(iEnd < iEndOfSegment-1)
01010     {
01011         iStart++;
01012         iEnd++;
01013 
01014         fInformation = sumVector(iStart, iEnd, vInformation);
01015         if( fInformation <  m_fMinInformation  )
01016         {
01017             while(fInformation < m_fMinInformation && (iEnd < iEndOfSegment-1) )
01018             {
01019                 iEnd++;
01020                 fInformation = sumVector(iStart, iEnd, vInformation);
01021             }
01022         }
01023         else
01024         {
01025             while(sumVector(iStart+1, iEnd, vInformation)  > m_fMinInformation )
01026             {
01027                 iStart++;
01028             }
01029         }
01030 
01031         iVarianceInflationIndex = determineVarianceInflationIndex(iStart, iEnd, vInformation);
01032         fLoh = likelihood(iStart, iEnd, dHomValueArray, dHetValueArray, iVarianceInflationIndex);
01033 
01034         if(fLoh > m_fLambdaCritical)
01035         {
01036             for(int i=iStart; i<=iEnd; i++)
01037            {
01038                vLoh[i] = 1;
01039            }
01040         }
01041         vWindowStart[iStart] = iStart;
01042         vWindowLength[iStart] = iEnd - iStart + 1;
01043         vWindowTest[iStart] = fLoh;
01044         vWindowInflate[iStart] = m_vVarianceInflationValues[iVarianceInflationIndex];
01045         if(fLoh > m_fLambdaCritical) {
01046            vWindowLoh[iStart] = 1;
01047         }
01048         else {
01049            vWindowLoh[iStart] = 0;
01050         }
01051     }
01052 
01053     return true;
01054 }
01055 
01056 double CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::homDistribution(double ecks,
01057                                                 double probabilityAA,
01058                                                 double probabilityBB,
01059                                                 double muPrimeAA,
01060                                                 double sigmaPrimeAA,
01061                                                 double muPrimeBB,
01062                                                 double sigmaPrimeBB)
01063 {
01064     double temp1 = normalDistribution(ecks, muPrimeAA, sigmaPrimeAA);
01065     double temp2 = normalDistribution(ecks, muPrimeBB, sigmaPrimeBB);
01066     double temp3 = (probabilityAA * temp1) + (probabilityBB * temp2);
01067     return temp3;
01068 
01069 /*  return ( (probabilityAA * normalDistribution(ecks, muPrimeAA, sigmaPrimeAA)) +
01070               (probabilityBB * normalDistribution(ecks, muPrimeBB, sigmaPrimeBB))
01071            );
01072 */
01073 }
01074 
01075 
01076 double CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::hetDistribution(double ecks,
01077                                                 double probabilityAA,
01078                                                 double probabilityBB,
01079                                                 double probabilityAB,
01080                                                 double muPrimeAA,
01081                                                 double sigmaPrimeAA,
01082                                                 double muPrimeBB,
01083                                                 double sigmaPrimeBB,
01084                                                 double muPrimeAB,
01085                                                 double sigmaPrimeAB)
01086 {
01087     double temp1 = normalDistribution(ecks, muPrimeAA, sigmaPrimeAA);
01088     double temp2 = normalDistribution(ecks, muPrimeBB, sigmaPrimeBB);
01089     double temp3 = normalDistribution(ecks, muPrimeAB, sigmaPrimeAB);
01090     double temp4 = (probabilityAA * temp1) + ( probabilityBB * temp2) + (probabilityAB * temp3);
01091     return temp4;
01092 
01093 /*  return ( (probabilityAA * normalDistribution(ecks, muPrimeAA, sigmaPrimeAA)) +
01094              (probabilityBB * normalDistribution(ecks, muPrimeBB, sigmaPrimeBB)) +
01095              (probabilityAB * normalDistribution(ecks, muPrimeAB, sigmaPrimeAB))
01096            );
01097 */
01098 }
01099 
01100 float CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2:: likelihood(    int iStart,
01101                                                 int iEnd,
01102                                                 AffxMultiDimensionalArray<double>& dHomValueArray,
01103                                                 AffxMultiDimensionalArray<double>& dHetValueArray,
01104                                                 int iVarianceInflationIndex)
01105 {
01106     double total=0.0;
01107     for(int i=iStart; i<=iEnd; i++)
01108     {
01109         double temp1 = dHomValueArray.get(i, iVarianceInflationIndex);
01110         double temp2 = dHetValueArray.get(i, iVarianceInflationIndex);
01111 
01112         if( temp1 != CN_INVALID_DOUBLE && temp2 != CN_INVALID_DOUBLE){
01113             total+=temp1;
01114             total-=temp2;
01115         }
01116     }
01117     return (float) total;
01118 }
01119 
01120 /**
01121  * @brief Create new segments
01122  * @param int - The segment type to create
01123  * @return int - The number of new segments created
01124  */
01125 int CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::newSegments(    int iSegmentType,
01126                                               const std::vector<float>& vSCAR,
01127                                               const std::vector<double>& vHomValues,
01128                                               const std::vector<double>& vHetValues)
01129 {
01130     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<int> vMarkerDistances(getProbeSets()->getCount());
01131 
01132     std::vector<float> vSCARreduced;
01133     std::vector<double> vHomValuesReduced;
01134     std::vector<double> vHetValuesReduced;
01135     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iIndex++)
01136     {
01137         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex);
01138         if(pobjProbeSet->isUseForCyto2LOH())
01139         {
01140             vSCARreduced.push_back(vSCAR[iIndex]);
01141             vHomValuesReduced.push_back(vHomValues[iIndex]);
01142             vHetValuesReduced.push_back(vHetValues[iIndex]);
01143         }
01144     }
01145 
01146     if (getProbeSets()->getCount() == 0) {return 0;}
01147     int iSegmentCount = 0;
01148     int iMarkerCount = 0;
01149     CNSegment* pobjSegment = NULL;
01150     CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = NULL;
01151     int iStartIndex = 0;
01152     if ((iSegmentType == 2) || (iSegmentType == 3) || (iSegmentType == 4) || (iSegmentType == 7))
01153     {
01154         for (;(iStartIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iStartIndex++)
01155         {
01156             pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iStartIndex);
01157             if ((double)pobjProbeSet->getLoh() == (double)pobjProbeSet->getLoh()) // Not = NaN
01158             {
01159                 break;
01160             }
01161         }
01162     }
01163     char cCall;
01164     int iPrevMarkerPosition;
01165     int iPosition;
01166     float fConfidence=0;
01167     int iConfidenceStart=0;
01168     int iConfidenceEnd=-1;
01169     int iPrevCNState = -1;
01170     if (iStartIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount() )
01171     {
01172         pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iStartIndex);
01173         while( (! pobjProbeSet->isUseForCyto2LOH())  && iStartIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount() )
01174         {
01175             iStartIndex++;
01176             if(iStartIndex==getProbeSets()->getCount()){
01177                 Verbose::warn(1, "CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::No probesets with valid information and/or Hom Het values.  Possibly a missing snp-reference file or information section in snp-reference file.");
01178                 return 0;
01179             }
01180             pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iStartIndex);
01181         }
01182         iPosition = pobjProbeSet->getPosition();
01183         iPrevMarkerPosition = iPosition;
01184         iPrevCNState = pobjProbeSet->getCNState();
01185         cCall = pobjProbeSet->getSegmentTypeCall(iSegmentType, getExperiment()->getCNCallGenderAsInt(), m_iXChromosome, m_iYChromosome);
01186 
01187         pobjSegment = new CNSegment;
01188         pobjSegment->setSegmentType(iSegmentType);
01189         pobjSegment->setChromosome(pobjProbeSet->getChromosome());
01190         pobjSegment->setStartPosition(pobjProbeSet->getPosition());
01191         pobjSegment->setEndPosition(pobjProbeSet->getPosition());
01192         pobjSegment->setCall(cCall);
01193         iMarkerCount = 0;
01194 
01195         for (int iIndex = iStartIndex; (iIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iIndex++)
01196         {
01197             pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex);
01198             if(pobjProbeSet->isUseForCyto2LOH()) {
01199                 iPosition = pobjProbeSet->getPosition();
01200                 cCall = pobjProbeSet->getSegmentTypeCall(       iSegmentType,
01201                                                                 getExperiment()->getCNCallGenderAsInt(),
01202                                                                 m_iXChromosome,
01203                                                                 m_iYChromosome);
01204 
01205                 // For CNNeutralLOH segments, keep cCall = 1 if current probe set's CN = -1
01206                 // and last seen probe set with a valid CN had CN = 2.
01207                 if (iSegmentType == 4 && cCall == 0  &&
01208                     pobjProbeSet->getCNState() == -1 && pobjProbeSet->getLoh() == 1 && iPrevCNState == 2)
01209                 {
01210                     cCall = (char)1;
01211                 }
01212                 // Same for normal diploid segments
01213                 if (iSegmentType == 5 && cCall == 0  &&
01214                     pobjProbeSet->getCNState() == -1 && pobjProbeSet->getLoh() == 0 && iPrevCNState == 2)
01215                 {
01216                     cCall = (char)1;
01217                 }
01218                 if ((iSegmentType == 2) || (iSegmentType == 3) || (iSegmentType == 4) || (iSegmentType == 7))
01219                 {
01220                     if ((double)pobjProbeSet->getLoh() != (double)pobjProbeSet->getLoh()) // NaN
01221                     {
01222                         continue;
01223                     }
01224                 }
01225                 if ((pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() != pobjSegment->getChromosome()) || (cCall != pobjSegment->getCall())
01226                        || (iPosition - iPrevMarkerPosition) > m_iLohCNSegSeparation )
01227                 {
01228                     pobjSegment->setMeanMarkerDistance(vMarkerDistances.mean(iMarkerCount - 1));
01229                     pobjSegment->setSegmentName(affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid());
01230                     pobjSegment->setMarkerCount(iMarkerCount);
01231                     if(iMarkerCount==1)
01232                     {
01233                         fConfidence = 0.0;
01234                         pobjSegment->setCall( (char) 0 );
01235                     } else
01236                     {
01237                         fConfidence = computeConfidence(iConfidenceStart, iConfidenceEnd, vSCARreduced, vHomValuesReduced, vHetValuesReduced);
01238                     }
01239                     iConfidenceStart = iConfidenceEnd+1;
01240                     pobjSegment->setConfidence(fConfidence);
01241                     m_vSegments.add(pobjSegment);
01242                     iSegmentCount++;
01243                     pobjSegment = new CNSegment;
01244                     pobjSegment->setSegmentType(iSegmentType);
01245                     pobjSegment->setCall(cCall);
01246                     pobjSegment->setChromosome(pobjProbeSet->getChromosome());
01247                     pobjSegment->setStartPosition(pobjProbeSet->getPosition());
01248                     iMarkerCount = 0;
01249                 }
01250                 iConfidenceEnd++;
01251                 iMarkerCount++;
01252                 pobjSegment->setEndPosition(pobjProbeSet->getPosition());
01253                 if (iMarkerCount > 1)
01254                 {
01255                     vMarkerDistances.set((iMarkerCount - 2), (pobjProbeSet->getPosition() - iPrevMarkerPosition));
01256                 }
01257                 iPrevMarkerPosition = iPosition;
01258                 if (pobjProbeSet->getCNState() != -1) {
01259                     iPrevCNState = pobjProbeSet->getCNState();
01260                 }
01261             }
01262         }
01263     }
01264     if (pobjSegment != NULL)
01265     {
01266         pobjSegment->setMarkerCount(iMarkerCount);
01267         pobjSegment->setSegmentName(affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid());
01268         fConfidence = computeConfidence(iConfidenceStart, iConfidenceEnd, vSCARreduced, vHomValuesReduced, vHetValuesReduced);
01269         pobjSegment->setConfidence(fConfidence);
01270         pobjSegment->setMeanMarkerDistance(vMarkerDistances.mean(iMarkerCount - 1));
01271         m_vSegments.add(pobjSegment); iSegmentCount++;
01272 }
01273     return iSegmentCount;
01274 }
01275 
01276 
01277 float CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::computeConfidence(      int iStart,
01278                                                         int iEnd,
01279                                                         const std::vector<float>& vSCAR,
01280                                                         const std::vector<double>& vHomValues,
01281                                                         const std::vector<double>& vHetValues)
01282 
01283 {
01284     double homTotal=0.0;
01285     double hetTotal=0.0;
01286     double temp1=0.0;
01287     double temp2=0.0;
01288     for(int i=iStart; i<=iEnd; i++)
01289     {
01290         temp1 = vHomValues[i];
01291         temp2 = vHetValues[i];
01292 
01293         if( temp1 != CN_INVALID_DOUBLE && temp2 != CN_INVALID_DOUBLE)
01294         {
01295             homTotal+=temp1;
01296             hetTotal+=temp2;
01297         }
01298     }
01299 
01300     double fExpHom = exp(homTotal);
01301     double fExpHet = exp(hetTotal);
01302 
01303     double fConfidence = fExpHom / (fExpHom + fExpHet);
01304     if(fConfidence == fConfidence) // !isnan
01305     {
01306         return (float) fConfidence;
01307     } else
01308     {
01309         if(homTotal > hetTotal)
01310         {
01311             return 1.0;
01312         }
01313         else
01314         {
01315             return 0.0;
01316         }
01317      }
01318 }
01319 
01320 int CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::determineVarianceInflationIndex(     int iStart,
01321                                                                 int iEnd,
01322                                                                 const std::vector<float>& vInformation)
01323 {
01324     if(m_iNumberOfVIValues == 1)
01325     {
01326         return 0;
01327     }
01328 
01329     std::vector<float> vSCARStoSort;
01330     for(int iIndex=iStart; iIndex<=iEnd; iIndex++)
01331     {
01332         vSCARStoSort.push_back(vInformation[iIndex]);
01333     }
01334     sort(vSCARStoSort.begin(), vSCARStoSort.end());
01335     int iQuantileIndex = Util::round( (iEnd-iStart+1)*0.25) - 1;
01336     //int iQuantileIndex = (int)(nearbyint(round( (iEnd-iStart+1)*0.25) ) - 1);
01337 
01338     float fVarianceInflationInput = vSCARStoSort[iQuantileIndex];
01339     int iPositionIndex=0;
01340     for(; iPositionIndex < m_vInformationRanges.size(); iPositionIndex++)
01341     {
01342         if(fVarianceInflationInput <= m_vInformationRanges[iPositionIndex])
01343         {
01344             break;
01345         }
01346     }
01347     if(fVarianceInflationInput > m_vInformationRanges[m_vInformationRanges.size()-1])
01348     {
01349         return m_vInformationRanges.size();
01350     }
01351     else
01352     {
01353         return iPositionIndex;
01354     }
01355 }

01358 void CNAnalysisMethodLOHCyto2::writeLOH(    std::vector<float>& vSCAR,
01359                                             std::vector<int>& vGenomeChunkStart,
01360                                             std::vector<int>& vGenomeChunkLength,
01361                                             std::vector<int>& vWindowStart,
01362                                             std::vector<int>& vWindowLength,
01363                                             std::vector<double>& vWindowTest,
01364                                             std::vector<double>& vWindowInflate,
01365                                             std::vector<char>& vWindowLoh )
01366 {
01367     affx::File5_File file5;
01368     affx::File5_Group* group5;
01369     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv_global = NULL;
01370     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv_model = NULL;
01371     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv_scar= NULL;
01372     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv_chunk = NULL;
01373     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv_window = NULL;
01374     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv_segment = NULL;
01375     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv_summary = NULL;
01376 
01377     std::string analysisString = "analysis";
01378     std::string strExperimentName = getExperiment()->getExperimentName();
01379     std::string fileName = Fs::join(getEngine()->getOpt("out-dir"),analysisString,
01380                                   strExperimentName+".loh.a5");
01381 
01382     Verbose::out(3, "Writing LOH data for " + fileName);
01383 
01384     try {
01385         file5.open(fileName, affx::FILE5_CREATE | affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01386         group5 = file5.openGroup("LOH", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01387 
01388         tsv_global = group5->openTsv("GlobalParams", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01389         tsv_global->defineColumn(0,0,"t_min", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
01390         tsv_global->defineColumn(0,1,"lambda_crit", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
01391 
01392         tsv_global->set_f(0,0, (float) m_fMinInformation );
01393         tsv_global->set_f(0,1, (float) m_fLambdaCritical );
01394         tsv_global->writeLevel(0);
01395         tsv_global->close();
01396         delete tsv_global;
01397 
01398         tsv_model = group5->openTsv("ModelParams", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01399         tsv_model->defineColumn(0,0,"muAA", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
01400         tsv_model->defineColumn(0,1,"muAB", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
01401         tsv_model->defineColumn(0,2,"muBB", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
01402         tsv_model->defineColumn(0,3,"sigmaAA", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
01403         tsv_model->defineColumn(0,4,"sigmaAB", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
01404         tsv_model->defineColumn(0,5,"sigmaBB", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
01405 
01406         tsv_model->set_f(0,0, (float) m_fMuPrimeAA );
01407         tsv_model->set_f(0,1, (float) m_fMuPrimeAB );
01408         tsv_model->set_f(0,2, (float) m_fMuPrimeBB );
01409         tsv_model->set_f(0,3, (float) m_fSigmaPrimeAA );
01410         tsv_model->set_f(0,4, (float) m_fSigmaPrimeAB );
01411         tsv_model->set_f(0,5, (float) m_fSigmaPrimeBB );
01412         tsv_model->writeLevel(0);
01413         tsv_model->close();
01414         delete tsv_model;
01415 
01416         tsv_scar = group5->openTsv("SCAR", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01417         tsv_scar->defineColumn(0,0,"ProbeSetName", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING, 20);
01418         tsv_scar->defineColumn(0,1,"Chromosome", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
01419         tsv_scar->defineColumn(0,2,"Position", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
01420         tsv_scar->defineColumn(0,3,"SCAR", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
01421 
01422         for(int iProbeSetIndex=0; iProbeSetIndex < m_pvProbeSets->getCount(); iProbeSetIndex++) {
01423             CNProbeSet* pProbeSet = m_pvProbeSets->getAt(iProbeSetIndex);
01424             if ( pProbeSet->isUseForCyto2LOH() ) {
01425                 tsv_scar->set_string(0,0, pProbeSet->getProbeSetName());
01426                 tsv_scar->set_i(0,1, pProbeSet->getChromosome());
01427                 tsv_scar->set_i(0,2, pProbeSet->getPosition());
01428                 tsv_scar->set_f(0,3, (float) vSCAR[iProbeSetIndex] );
01429                 tsv_scar->writeLevel(0);
01430             }
01431         }
01432         tsv_scar->close();
01433         delete tsv_scar;
01434 
01435         tsv_chunk = group5->openTsv("Chunks", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01436         tsv_chunk->defineColumn(0,0,"StartChromosome", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
01437         tsv_chunk->defineColumn(0,1,"StartPosition", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
01438         tsv_chunk->defineColumn(0,2,"Length", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
01439 
01440         for(unsigned int iChunkIndex=0; iChunkIndex < vGenomeChunkStart.size(); iChunkIndex++) {
01441             CNProbeSet* pProbeSet = m_pvProbeSets->getAt(vGenomeChunkStart[iChunkIndex]);
01442             tsv_chunk->set_i(0,0, pProbeSet->getChromosome());
01443             tsv_chunk->set_i(0,1, pProbeSet->getPosition());
01444             tsv_chunk->set_i(0,2, vGenomeChunkLength[iChunkIndex] );
01445             tsv_chunk->writeLevel(0);
01446         }
01447         tsv_chunk->close();
01448         delete tsv_chunk;
01449 
01450         tsv_window = group5->openTsv("Windows", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01451         tsv_window->defineColumn(0,0,"StartChromosome", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
01452         tsv_window->defineColumn(0,1,"StartPosition", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
01453         tsv_window->defineColumn(0,2,"Length", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
01454         tsv_window->defineColumn(0,3,"Test", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
01455         tsv_window->defineColumn(0,4,"Inflate", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
01456         tsv_window->defineColumn(0,5,"Loh", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_CHAR);
01457 
01458         for(unsigned int iWindowIndex=0; iWindowIndex < vWindowStart.size(); iWindowIndex++) {
01459             CNProbeSet* pProbeSet = m_pvProbeSets->getAt(vWindowStart[iWindowIndex]);
01460             tsv_window->set_i(0,0, pProbeSet->getChromosome());
01461             tsv_window->set_i(0,1, pProbeSet->getPosition());
01462             tsv_window->set_i(0,2, vWindowLength[iWindowIndex] );
01463             tsv_window->set_f(0,3, (float) vWindowTest[iWindowIndex] );
01464             tsv_window->set_f(0,4, (float) vWindowInflate[iWindowIndex] );
01465             tsv_window->set_c(0,5, vWindowLoh[iWindowIndex] );
01466             tsv_window->writeLevel(0);
01467         }
01468         tsv_window->close();
01469         delete tsv_window;
01470 
01471         tsv_segment = group5->openTsv("Segments", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01472         tsv_segment->defineColumn(0,0,"StartChromosome", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
01473         tsv_segment->defineColumn(0,1,"StartPosition", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
01474         tsv_segment->defineColumn(0,2,"EndPosition", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
01475         tsv_segment->defineColumn(0,3,"NumberMarkers", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
01476         tsv_segment->defineColumn(0,4,"MeanMarkerDistance", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
01477         tsv_segment->defineColumn(0,5,"LOHState", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_CHAR);
01478         tsv_segment->defineColumn(0,6,"Confidence", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
01479 
01480         for(unsigned int iSegmentIndex=0; iSegmentIndex < m_vSegments.size(); iSegmentIndex++) {
01481             CNSegment *pSegment = m_vSegments.getAt(iSegmentIndex);
01482             if( pSegment->getSegmentType() == 3 ) {
01483                 tsv_segment->set_i(0,0, pSegment->getChromosome());
01484                 tsv_segment->set_i(0,1, pSegment->getStartPosition() );
01485                 tsv_segment->set_i(0,2, pSegment->getEndPosition() );
01486                 tsv_segment->set_i(0,3, pSegment->getMarkerCount() );
01487                 tsv_segment->set_i(0,4, (int) pSegment->getMeanMarkerDistance() );
01488                 tsv_segment->set_c(0,5, pSegment->getCall() );
01489                 tsv_segment->set_f(0,6, (float) pSegment->getConfidence() );
01490                 tsv_segment->writeLevel(0);
01491             }
01492         }
01493         tsv_segment->close();
01494         delete tsv_segment;
01495 
01496         std::pair<char, float> data;
01497         tsv_summary = group5->openTsv("Summary", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01498         tsv_summary->defineColumn(0,0,"Metric", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING, 10);
01499         tsv_summary->defineColumn(0,1,"Value", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
01500         for(unsigned int iChrIndex=0; iChrIndex < getExperiment()->getNumberOfChromosomesToReport(); iChrIndex++) {
01501             data = getExperiment()->getChromosomeLOH(iChrIndex);
01502             if( data.first != 24 ) {
01503                 tsv_summary->set_string(0,0, "Chr"+ToStr((int)data.first) );
01504             }
01505             else {
01506                 tsv_summary->set_string(0,0, "ChrX" );
01507             }
01508             tsv_summary->set_f(0,1, (float) data.second );
01509             tsv_summary->writeLevel(0);
01510         }
01511 
01512         tsv_summary->set_string(0,0, "Overall" );
01513         tsv_summary->set_f(0,1, (float) getExperiment()->getGenomeLOH() );
01514         tsv_summary->writeLevel(0);
01515 
01516         tsv_summary->close();
01517         delete tsv_summary;
01518 
01519         delete group5;
01520         file5.close();
01521     }
01522     catch(...){ throw(Except("Cannot open file " + fileName + " while attempting to dump intensities to file."));}
01523 }
